website_summaries.verdict: The Parrot Bebop 2 definitely improves on the original and remains a good choice for its portability and safer design, but stiffer competition and merely good image quality limit its overall appeal.
pros: The Parrot Bebop Drone 2 is small enough to stick in your average backpack, but sturdier than the original with about twice the battery life
Its propellers stop the instant they're obstructed, easy barrel rolls and flips and new banked turns capability makes it more fun to fly, and it's stable indoors or outside
It can be piloted with third-party Bluetooth controllers
cons: It's pricey when bundled with the massive Skycontroller remote control, and its video quality hasn't improved much from the first-gen Bebop
In-app purchases are required for features other drone makers include
Its control range is dependent on your mobile device and flight conditions
It's limited to 8GB of internal storage for photos and video

customer_reviews.title: Fun to fly, easy to pack and travel with
customer_reviews.text: I chose the Bebop 2 over the Pahntom 3 standard for two reasons: 1) The bebop is small and compact for easy transport to remote locations. 2) No external gimbal to break on a hard landing. I currently use this with a wifi range extender to achieve fairly long range flights. The free Android app seems to function well as does the optional Flight Plan ($20) which allows you to pre-program flights with waypoints, etc. Pros: Compact and light No external gimbal to break Appealing design Apps are well written Cons: Image quality isn't as good as expected but is acceptable

product_meta.title: Parrot Bebop 2 - Red
product_meta.description: Meet Bebop 2, a second-generation Parrot Quadcopter Drone. First in its weight class to surpass 20 minutes of autonomous flight time, this sleek and durable drone doesn’t just travel far, it travels well. The 3-axis digital stabilization offers pilots a fixed angle of the view, regardless of altitude or turbulence. The 14mpx, 1080p camera captures the moment via live streaming video or recorded clips. Take in the horizon with a stunning 186° field of view and keep track of your location with the new, powerful rear flash LED. Fly for up to 25 minutes at speeds of up to 38 mph
feature_bullets: Enhanced 14 megapixel fish-eye lens offers 1080p video recording and image capture
25 minutes of flight time thanks to a powerful 2700 mAh battery
Equipped with powerful motors for flight in greater altitudes
Powerful rear flash LED for better visibility—even in the dark,Connect to the App StoreTM or Google PlayTM and download the FreeFlight 3 application
Requires registration with FAA. Visit their website for more info on how to register.
